programme.title: Fibroids and Women s Health What Men Need To Know
programme.desc: Dr. Pierre Johnson, Ob-Gyn, is on a mission to end the health disparities that plague African Americans, especially Black women. Also known as “The Fibroid Slayer,” Dr. Johnson showcases his work as a surgeon on social media platforms to educate and empower women to overcome racism in medicine and understand their rights and options in pursuit of the best health outcomes. A proud Chicagoan—also an author and a passionate advocate of mentorship—Dr. Johnson joins Beyond The Hype to share why women’s health is not just a woman’s issue.

programme.title: NeNe Leakes Under the Bright Lights of Broadway
programme.desc: NeNe Leakes takes us on her journey from being one of the leading personalities on reality TV to making her Broadway debut as “Madam” in Cinderella. We also feature Adenah Bayoh, who after escaping a Civil War in Liberia, grew a multi-million dollar business and became the top employer in her community. She was the youngest person to become a franchisee at IHOP. Get get career advice from Egypt Sherrod, who talks to us about her true passion, and how making the switch from the leading lady in radio, to a real estate maven. She is now redefining her idea of success as host of Property Virgin. And finally we profile Howard University Middle School of Mathematics and Science and the students who graduate with an appreciation in STEM. Yohance Maqubella is the schools executive director.

programme.title: Unlock the Power of Your Dreams
programme.desc: Rachel Senior, a dream coach and the author of “The Business of Dreams,” shares how to find purpose and success through dreams

programme.title: The Reset Adopting A Prosperity Mindset For 2025
programme.desc: The holiday season (and the spending that comes with it) is over and we’ve crossed the threshold of a brand new year. This is the season to take a beat, reset our lifestyles, realign our budgets, and make financial wellness and family wealth priorities. dFree Global Foundation Founder & CEO DeForest B. Soaries Jr. joins Your Money Your Life to share the rich rewards of bringing intentionality and awareness to our financial choices. Lock in to gain a prosperity mindset for 2025.

programme.title: First Black Billionaire s Mission to Get Blacks 14 Trillion in Reparations
programme.desc: Iconic entrepreneur Bob Johnson has broken barriers and built empires as founder of BET and chairman of The RLJ Companies, a diversified conglomerate. In an exclusive interview with Black Enterprise CEO Butch Graves, he shares his proposals to transfer wealth to African Americans using reparations and boost black political power through the creation of an independent party.

programme.title: The Best Power of the Purse Segments
programme.desc: This week on "Women of Power", we highlight the best of our most popular Power of the Purse segments. We start with our correspondent Shartia Brantley discussing what it means to be financially faithful. Then, we take a look at best tips on buying a cars. Then we sit with Black Enterprises Senior Editor of Personal Finance, Stacy Tisdale, for a few tips on how to help family members when they ask for money without hurting your own bank account, with the holidays just around the corner, Jacquette Timmons gives us some helpful tips for spending without overspending.

programme.title: September 11th: Mayhem or Miracles?
programme.desc: The September 11, 2001 attacks impacted American society like no event since Pearl Harbor. This program examines the heroes who emerged amidst the horror of 9-11 and shows the selflessness of everyday men and women under the most adverse conditions.

programme.title: Crop Circles: Celestial Signs or Human Hoaxes?
programme.desc: Clearly some crop circles are hoaxes. Others are inexplicable, with no evidence of human activity. This program asks why do crops undergo changes at the cellular level and what are the strange lights seen over the fields where crop circles are found?

programme.title: Alien Creatures from Beyond: Monsters, Ghosts and Vampires
programme.desc: Are there creatures still unknown to science lurking in the remote areas of our planet? Hundreds of eyewitnesses say unquestionably YES. Lurking in Magog is the elusive Memphre, a thirty-foot lake monster that stalks the peaceful waters of Lake Memphremagog. Wilno, Ontario is a small town steeped in its heritage, locals believe that when a person takes their own life, then is buried on sacred ground, that person will become a vampire who will walk the streets, preying on their family members. The Bytown Museum sits at the gateway to the Rideau Canal and may also be a gateway to the paranormal. Bell Island is a place steeped in mysteries and legends encountered firsthand by local residents living around the marshes known as Dobbin’s Garden. The residents have named their local Banshee “The Bell Island Hag” explaining that sometimes she appears as a beautiful woman in white, but more often as a horrifying deformed old hag. Men have been known to enter the marshes and then emerge days later scared to death with no memory of what happened, or where they had been. Banshees, Lake Monsters, Vampires and more will be encountered in this special compilation of “Alien Creatures from Beyond.”

programme.title: Alien Agenda: Project Grey
programme.desc: It's fear that they seek! Dr. Schroder listens to her criminally insane patient as he recounts the story of the murder of his four friends. A story of infidelity, jealousy and revenge takes a strange turn revealing an Alien Agenda. Chip implants, government mind control, Russian military and Alien visitors form the puzzle pieces of this science fiction thriller. A search for the answers leads to the mind-bending truth...It's our fear that they seek. The Aliens are HERE and they show no mercy toward mankind, only disgust for what the human race has become.

programme.title: Nacho Mountain
programme.desc: Keefer has a talent. He can eat...A LOT. But it’s not until after getting fired from his job, finding his girl getting railed by a tranny and almost getting arrested for drug trafficking, that Keefer decides (with the help of his best friend Meegosh) to start an underground food eating competition. After the health crazed Mayor Fingstal and his cronies Officers Slivjack and Biggsley catch wind of it, all hell breaks loose. Then it all comes down to one final food battle from hell, THE NACHO MOUNTAIN! Set to a killer Stoner Rock soundtrack with loads of babes and crazy characters in the vein of Porky's and Meatballs, Nacho Mountain is sure to please those who have gotten beaten down, only to eat their way to the top!

programme.title: Travel Man S05 E01 - Rome With Matt Lucas NB
programme.desc: Richard is joined by Matt Lucas, actor, comedian and many other things besides, for a frenetic 48 hours in the eternal city, Rome. Over a packed duo of days they cram in culture, cuisine, history, hats and as many sights as they can see.

programme.title: Travel Man S05 E02 - Valencia With Sara Pascoe NB
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade is joined by comedian Sara Pascoe for a two day test of the mini break merits of Valencia. Together they ruthlessly examine Spain's third largest city, taking in its history, parks, architecture, culture and cuisine, as well as falling under the powerful spell of local cocktail agua de Valencia.

programme.title: Travel Man S05 E03 - Amsterdam With Joe Lycett NB
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade and comedian Joe Lycett head to the mini break mecca of Amsterdam for a 48 hour hurtle through the city's attractions. In just two days the pair power through culture, cardio, canals, cuisine and much more, not all of it beginning with a 'c'.

programme.title: Travel Man S05 E04 - Stockholm With Sally Phillips NB
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade and actress Sally Phillips head to Stockholm for a fulsome 48 hours in the Swedish capital. Together they scale rooftops, sing Abba, eat Swedish-Danish, and stay up late playing on their phones.

programme.title: The RVers S01 E10 - RVing With Friends, RV Electrical, Towing 101 NB
programme.desc: Spending time with friends is great. But camping with them is pretty darn close to living together.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay’s Great Escape S01 E03 - India Part 3 NB
programme.desc: Gordon heads south to the coasts of Kerala for the ultimate seafood curry. In Tamil Nadu he hits a meat-free zone and faces his biggest culinary nightmare, living in an ashram where the only food on the menu is vegetarian. Any tranquillity soon evaporates when Gordon tries his highest-octane sport yet - bullock racing - before his final stop in the slums of Mumbai. There he cooks on Slumdog Millionaire streets before putting himself to the ultimate test, cooking alongside one of India's top chefs for a star-studded dinner at the Taj Hotel.

programme.title: HEALTH EXPLORED.109.Purpose Of Life (Part 2)
programme.desc: We travel to the Japanese island known for having some of the oldest people on Earth. We engage with leading scientists who have identified the "Longevity Gene," offering a glimpse into the genetic factors that contribute to extended lifespans. Beyond genetics, we explore the deeply ingrained cultural practices that sustain long, fulfilling lives in Okinawa. We delve into the importance of "moai," a lifelong social network that supports residents into their golden years, and the principle of "Hara Hachi Bu," which advises eating until you're 80% full while focusing on nourishing foods. But at the core of Okinawan longevity, we find "ikigai"—a profound sense of life purpose. From practicing martial arts to active community participation, we discover that Okinawan seniors maintain a vibrant sense of purpose in various facets of life. Join us on this enlightening journey to learn how the pillars of social support, mindful eating, and a strong sense of ikigai could enhance your own quest for a long and fulfilling life.

programme.title: HEALTH EXPLORED.110.Way Of The Forest
programme.desc: We travel to the Japanese island known for having some of the oldest people on Earth. We engage with leading scientists who have identified the "Longevity Gene," offering a glimpse into the genetic factors that contribute to extended lifespans. Beyond genetics, we explore the deeply ingrained cultural practices that sustain long, fulfilling lives in Okinawa. We delve into the importance of "moai," a lifelong social network that supports residents into their golden years, and the principle of "Hara Hachi Bu," which advises eating until you're 80% full while focusing on nourishing foods. But at the core of Okinawan longevity, we find "ikigai"—a profound sense of life purpose. From practicing martial arts to active community participation, we discover that Okinawan seniors maintain a vibrant sense of purpose in various facets of life. Join us on this enlightening journey to learn how the pillars of social support, mindful eating, and a strong sense of ikigai could enhance your own quest for a long and fulfilling life.

programme.title: Arches & Canyonlands Ambient Nature Film
programme.desc: The sublime landscape of Arches and Canyonlands area of Utah is the star in this 90 minute film, which showcases awe-inspiring natural arches, dramatic canyon vista sunrises & sunsets, and flights through arches and over the Colorado River canyon. The spectacular cinematography is accompanied by beautiful Native American flute music. Note: All Drone footage was filmed outside of National and State Park boundaries.

programme.title: Preview for "Seasons of the Sierra" 3 Hour Ambient Nature Film
programme.desc: Available January 11. Experience the spectacular seasons of the Sierra Mountains in this 3 hour film. From vast swaths of colorful aspens to sparkling wildflower meadows, the "Seasons of the Sierra" showcases the stunning beauty of the Range of Light.

programme.title: Preview of 5 Hour Crackling Fireplace

programme.title: Preview for Mountain Meadows Nature Film
programme.desc: This is a preview for the two hour nature film “Mountain Meadows”, featuring wildflower blooms from California’s Table Mountain ecological preserve, along with meadows & lakes in the High Sierra mountains. The full length “Mountain Meadows” nature film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.TV.

programme.title: Nature's Abstracts
programme.desc: This 2 hour moving art film immerses you in the wondrous abstract patterns found in nature through the fine art photography of Elizabeth Carmel.

programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs
programme.desc: S1:E6 Fredia Gibbs was the first female African American kickboxing world champion who learned how to fight as a child because she grew up scared and afraid. It wasn’t until she unknowingly got into a van alone after a party with a man who turned out to be a serial killer, that all the years of fighting and training would help her unleash the power she had inside of her and catapult her to new heights.

programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: Nicole Kidman vs. Tom Cruise
programme.desc: S1:E9 Was Scientology the reason why Tom Cruise divorced Nicole Kidman? Nicole was obsessed with Tom. She tried to do everything she could to be with the superstar at all times. But Tom had another obsession: Scientology. Then, when Tom Cruise suddenly divorced Nicole, the world she thought she was living in shattered into a million pieces. Was it because of Scientology? Was it the multiple miscarriages she had? Was it the wiretap Tom allegedly put on Nicole? This story was so uncovered, that our team had to dig deep to get the details.

programme.title: Anna Faris vs. Chris Pratt
programme.desc: S1:E6 If Chris Pratt didn’t have an affair with Jennifer Lawrence, why did he file for divorce From Anna Faris? Chris Pratt and Anna Faris were the famous, ideal couple the world couldn’t get enough of. But when Chris Pratt skyrocketed into superstardom, Anna felt more and more insecure. Then, rumors of Chris having an affair with co-star Jennifer Lawrence emerged. Even though they both deny having an affair, Chris and Annas sudden divorce, fallout of their personal lives, and the health of their son caused a media frenzy that our team got to the bottom of.

programme.title: The Kardashians vs. Jordyn Woods
programme.desc: S1:E4 Jordyn Woods was somebody the Kardashian family trusted. But all that changed when rumours of her being a home wrecker emerged after a scandalous yet confusing night at a party with Khloé Kardashian’s then-boyfriend and NBA player, Tristan Thompson. Our team investigated both sides of the story and got the real truth about what happened that night.

programme.title: Drake Vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E16 Drake went from hip hop hero to deadbeat dad when Kanye West collaborator Pusha T revealed Drake was hiding a secret son, but why was he hiding his son in the first place? And how did Pusha know about it?Everybody assumed Kanye had leaked the information because he was threatened by Drake’s success, but the truth is way more complicated.After digging into Drake and Kanye’s feud and friendship, our team discovered the real story behind Drake’s secret son and the journey he went on to embrace fatherhood for himself.

programme.title: Kim Kardashian & Pete Davidson Vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E14 The whole world witnessed Kim and Kanyes marriage fall apart. At first it seemed like they were supporting each other through their divorce, but suddenly Kanye started to publicly attack Kim, accusing her of exploiting and kidnapping their children. What happened? Our team did some digging and traced it all back to Kims performance on SNL. Everyone assumes Kanye’s attacks are because of Pete Davidson, but we uncovered the real reason Kanye turned against Kim Kardashian.

programme.title: Mia Kang The Woman That I Am
programme.desc: Overweight as a child, Mia Kang suffered bullying and a far from ideal childhood. Desperate to lose weight and feel good about herself, Mia began starving herself at the young age of 13. She lost a lot of weight very quickly and this launched her into the modeling industry which continued to destroy her self-esteem and health, until a vacation in Thailand, and her discovery of Muay Thai changed her life forever.

programme.title: Pardeep Kaleka Empathy - The Path From Darkness to Light
programme.desc: This is the remarkable story of Pardeep Kaleka, a faithful Sikh believer, and his quest to track down his fathers killer. In his search for truth, he bonded with a former White Supremacist. What did they have in common? And how did their friendship transform lives around the world? Forgiveness is a powerful tool to heal ourselves, connect deeply, and truly make our world better. Who do you need to forgive today?

programme.title: The Kardashian Redemption - The Unauthorized Documentary
programme.desc: When OJ Simpson destroyed her family, Kim Kardashian avenged her father, Robert Kardashian.

programme.title: Brian Bushway Blind Sports
programme.desc: Record breaking mountain biker Brian Bushway became totally blind at the age of 14. He went from being an active teen outdoors to depression and uncertainty. He never thought he would be able to ride his bike again, until he developed a superpower that allowed him to see.

programme.title: Ultimate Freedom March Remembering John Lewis
programme.desc: This short documentary is a tribute to the memory of civil rights leader John Lewis, his relationship with Martin Luther King Jr. and the courage he showed in fighting for an ideal, for freedom, democracy and justice. There is a moment in everyones life when our hearts are pounding and we are inspired and motivated to be the hero of our story. Step forward and go for what you believe in.

programme.title: Inky Johnson Knocked Down to Rise Up - Shattered Dream
programme.desc: Growing up in poverty, Inky Johnson dreamt of a better life -- one where he could provide for his family. A gifted football player, Inky was on his way to this dream -- playing college football & getting named a definite First Round NFL Draft pick, but tragedy struck when he was just 10 games away from the NFL. What happened next will inspire you to never give up on your dreams, no matter the obstacles you might encounter.

programme.title: Craig Scott A Nation s Wound
programme.desc: In this bone-chilling retelling of one of the deadliest school shootings in history, Columbine survivor Craig Scott reveals the secret left by his sister who died that day.

programme.title: Muggsy Bogues A Giant On The Court
programme.desc: Muggsy Bogues is the shortest man in NBA history at only 5 ft 3. He’s also one of the best basketball players of all time. Coming from a rough neighbourhood where he was shot at by the age of 5, no one believed in him. He was bullied and mocked because of his height, yet today, he’s got some of the best basketball dunks ever seen. Now, everyone wonders: hows that possible? How did he even make it to the NBA? This is Muggsy’s story: a true underdog who had all the odds against him.

programme.title: The Most Banned Author in America
programme.desc: Maya Angelou’s traumatic childhood changed the trajectory of her life. She lived in silence for many years, afraid for her safety and the safety of her loved ones. America couldn’t handle her truth when she finally shared what happened, and was quick to ban her story but it caught like wildfire. This story changed the world and yours can, too. Enjoy this new inspirational documentary!

programme.title: Find Your Talent
programme.desc: Tom Bilyeu, co-founder of Quest Nutrition and co-founder & CEO of Impact Theory, reveals how this shift in mindset helped him find his passion.

programme.title: Our 50 000 Clients - What Insurance Companies Did They Choose
programme.desc: "Choosing the right Medicare plan can be overwhelming, with so many options available. In this video, Marvin Musick will walk you through the process of selecting the perfect plan for your needs. At MedicareSchool.com, we ve helped over 50,000 clients in the past 36 months find the right coverage. We ll show you how we guide our clients through the decision-making process to ensure they choose the plan that fits their healthcare needs and financial situation."

programme.title: The Worst Supplemental Plan vs The BEST Paying A 282 000 Medical Bill
programme.desc: "Many of you on Medicare have chosen a Supplemental Plan that has many benefits and can save you thousands in Medical bills. However, not all Supplemental plans are the same. In this episode, Medicare Schools Chief Educator Marvin Musick, will show you the best and worst Supplemental Plan for a $282K bill for lung cancer."

programme.title: 9 Answers to Boost Tax-Free Roth Retirement Income
programme.desc: "Joe Anderson, CFP® and Big Al Clopine, CPA spitball on paying the tax on your Roth conversions on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast number 507. If you take the money out of your retirement account, what does Joe mean that you ll be paying the tax to pay the tax to pay the tax ? Can you pay it from the Roth itself, or from monthly pension tax withholding? Are the fellas wrong on this topic altogether? Plus, withdrawing Roth 401(k) contributions rolled to an IRA, the 5-year Roth withdrawal rules, saving to tax-deferred, taxable, or tax-free accounts, consolidating individual stock investments, the home office deduction, and a reviewer says Joe has checked out."

programme.title: Financial Planning at Every Age Retirement Planning for Millennials Gen-X Baby Boomers
programme.desc: "Whether youre a Millennial just getting started, a Gen-Xer juggling lifes competing demands, or a Baby Boomer eyeing the finish line, the stakes are high when creating financial security for your future. Joe Anderson, CFP and Big Al Clopine, CPA guide you through the financial strategies and goals each generation should implement that can mean the difference between a retirement of scarcity or abundance."

programme.title: How to Manage Asset Allocation and Asset Location
programme.desc: How can asset allocation and asset location impact your overall financial plan? Understanding asset allocation and asset location can enhance your portfolio returns over time to ensure youre optimizing your portfolio to help you reach your goals.

programme.title: How to Maximize Retirement Income Implement and Do Better Than the 4 Rule
programme.desc: Planning for a comfortable retirement requires careful consideration of various factors, and one commonly discussed approach is the 4 rule. Its essential to understand the nuances of the 4 rule and explore additional strategies to make the most out of your retirement savings.

programme.title: Turning 65 Why I Would NOT Take Social Security
programme.desc: Are you nearing 65 and thinking over Social Security benefits? Before you make that crucial decision, join Marvin Musick from Medicare School. He will walk you through the ins and outs of Social Security as you are turning 65! Were diving deep into the nitty-gritty of Social Security benefits. Did you know the timing of your benefits can significantly impact your financial future? Whether youre considering early retirement at 62 or delaying till 70, Ive got the lowdown on how each choice affects your pocket. Well calculate together, step-by-step, to find out your full retirement age and how this magic number transforms your benefits. But wait, theres more! Its not just about numbers; its about strategy and longevity. Marvin is going to share with you FIVE real-life scenarios where waiting on Social Security could be your golden ticket. Think you know it all about Social Security? Think again! Marvin is going to give you tips that could change the way you view your retirement planning.

programme.title: I Would Not Want Cancer On THIS Medicare Plan __
programme.desc: "Facing cancer is tough enough, and understanding how Medicare fits into this challenge can be just as daunting. Marvin Musick from Medicare School helps you through the crucial decisions you need to make regarding Medicare plans in the face of cancer. We all know cancer brings not only health concerns but also serious financial implications. Thats why were focusing on the real costs of cancer treatment, the hard-hitting statistics, and their impact on your finances. Its a startling fact: cancer patients are 2.5 times more likely to face bankruptcy due to treatment costs. Our goal is to help you through these critical decisions."

programme.title: Formula for Retirement
programme.desc: "There are financial formulas to live by, and others that can absolutely derail your retirement dreams! Discover which retirement formulas and rules of thumb may be your golden ticket, and which are your one-way ticket to trouble, on this episode of Your Money, Your Wealth with Joe Anderson, CFP and Big Al Clopine, CPA."

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.desc: 'David' tells the story of Daud, an eleven year old religious Muslim boy growing up in Brooklyn. Concealing his Muslim identity, Daud inadvertently befriends a group of Jewish boys who through a haphazard sequence of events mistake him for being Jewish and accept him as one of their own. A genuine bond of friendship is formed between Daud and Yoav, on of the Jewish boys; Daud experiences a sense of freedom, joy, and camaraderie that he has never felt before, and for a brief time enjoys being a carefree eleven year old Brooklyn boy. When the Jewish boys discover Daud's true identity, Daud's world is shattered and he is left alone, struggling to come to terms with his place in the world.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Travelogue
programme.desc: Travelogue is a 30-minute travel program. Through the journeys of our intrepid hosts, we experience the beauty, culture and mystery of China, discovering how people live in this vast country and showcasing China's transformation to the world.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Today’s Top Pick

A broad selection of top productions by Chinese top documentary producers.

programme.title: CGTN NOTICIAS
programme.desc: Es el informativo estelar del canal, con las últimas noticias del acontecer político, social, deportivo y cultural de China y el resto del mundo. Los hechos que constituyen titulares están aquí, en CGTN Noticias.

programme.title: HORA INFANTIL

programme.title: Moss Trophy
programme.desc: A race for closed-cockpit GT cars from before 1963, including the Jaguar E-type, Ferrari 250 SWB, and Aston Martin DB4GT, evoking the golden era of GT racing.

programme.title: International Classic GT
programme.desc: Big engines and beautiful bodies — from Cobras to E-Types, Silverstone’s GT grid delivers roaring V8 drama and classic endurance spirit in a head-turning spectacle.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: MotoVation Supersport
programme.desc: The follow-up race turns pressure to the max. Riders look to finish their season push strong with calculated aggression and pure precision.

programme.title: Dress Up Your Wardrobe
programme.desc: We expand our view of classics by adding surface embellishments to personalize your garment. Cindy Hogan makes appliques from embroidery to add detail to any garment. Then, it's our next lesson in the Little Black Dress from Angela Wolf and different seam finishes including the Hong Kong. Last is embroidery expert Eileen Roche and easy dress embroidery for beautiful style.

programme.title: Off Our Needles
programme.desc: Hold onto your needles! Tracie and Jodi, are here to dish out fresh fiber inspiration. From project picks to wooly good gossip, things are about to get super knitty… and maybe just a little nutty.

programme.title: Living Places
programme.desc: Each plant and creature has a habitat. To capture the freshness of the ocean, Jenny Barnett-Rohrs makes jars inspired by sea glass. For her art project, Candie Cooper looks to the rainforest for ideas. Then, she sponge-paints an animal foot-print rug. Jenny makes a 3-D diorama of animal habitats from paper and foam.

programme.title: Creatures
programme.desc: With some paper and a little creativity, we'll make a silly, slithery creature. Candie Cooper recreates impressionist art and Katie Hacker makes glittery slime. Jenny Barnett-Rohrs makes creepy eyeballs and silly spiders for Halloween fun from blogger Morena Hockley.

programme.title: Tie It
programme.desc: Tie it all together with a color drop necklace with tied ribbon, a loomed mosaic bracelet using tile beads with Julianna Hudgins and a recycled tie, cuff bracelet featuring crystal with Laura Timmons.

programme.title: Style and Color
programme.desc: Molly Schaller shows how she uses trend boards to design jewelry and demonstrates trendy leather bracelets with large focal beads. Then she makes a colorful statement necklace and shares great tips on storing bead strands. In Katie's Beading Lesson she shows how to organize your work space. She offers suggestions for the right supplies and tools and adds another important element -- lighting, especially when working with small beads and distinguishing colors.

programme.title: Alphabet Soup
programme.desc: It's always fun to test out new techniques possibly using some of your favorite supplies in a new way. Today's menu features alphabet soup. Make a best friend's page featuring watercolors. Use glue as paint to create a unique resist and stencil and an organizer from Vicki O'Dell that reflects your scrapbook style.

programme.title: Bricks Need Mortar - They Don't Stand Alone
programme.desc: Combine materials with inspiration to make contemporary art. Julie Fei Fan Balzer sews and stamps fabric embellishments for book covers and more. Debbi Simon combines clay with uncommon materials to create unique 3-D pieces. Julie Fei Fan Balzer screen prints with stencils and Mary Hettsmansperger adds shine to metalwork with mica.

programme.title: The Midnight Quilt Show
programme.desc: Say hello to The Midnight Quilt Show, a series that celebrates late-night stitches, taking shortcuts and sewing in your PJs! Each week, host Angela Walters will bring you a quick and quippy breakdown of a brand new quilt… wine not included.

programme.title: Shenker,Ganchoff, Rechtzeit & Acheron
programme.desc: The Milken Archive of Jewish Music Presents Conversations, featuring Chassidic Music Composer Ben Zion Shenker, the Cantor's Cantor Moshe Ganchoff, Seymour Rechtzeit on Yiddish American Theater and Joseph Achron's Violin Concerto No. 1.

programme.title: The Center for Jewish History Presents The
programme.desc: The real-life origin story of comic books and superheroes by pioneering Jewish Americans from World War II to the present day?as colorful and thrilling as the comics themselves.

programme.title: Conflict Resolution & Forgiveness
programme.desc: Hanan Harchol explores Jewish thought on Conflict Resolution and Forgiveness, in engaging, thought-provoking animated conversations with his Israeli parents.

programme.title: My Opposition: The Diaries of F. Kellner
programme.desc: The stories of Friedrich Kellner, a political activist during World War II, and his grandson, who learned of his grandfather's anti-Nazi diaries, and made it his mission to have them published to alert the world to the dangers of totalitarianism

programme.title: Factor's Deli, Los Angeles
programme.desc: Actor Mike Burstyn and Perla Karney meet at Factor's Deli in Los Angeles to kibbitz in Yiddish and enjoy many classic deli dishes, including chopped liver, matzah ball soup, nova lox, bagels, pastrami and corned beef sandwiches, brisket and more.

programme.title: Honoring The Liberators
programme.desc: The National Museum of American Jewish Military History honors the Jewish American liberators of the World War II Concentration Camps.

programme.title: Meet Sol Krupnick
programme.desc: Sol Krupnick is a kibitzer who shares hilarious stories about his crazy family, regales us with classic Borscht Belt jokes, and offers his own unique observations about our meshuganah world. And you don t have to be Jewish to enjoy the laughs.

programme.title: Felix The Ghost Breaker (1923)
programme.desc: Felix is trying to get some sleep in a graveyard, but keeps getting bothered by a ghost. He follows the ghost to the house of an old farmer, and the ghost proceeds to terrorize the old man, and when the farmer calls for help from the police, the ghost terrorizes them, too. Felix, however, suspects something fishy is going on, and with the help of the farmer's donkey, gets to the bottom of things.

programme.title: Dr Terror's House of Horrors (1965)
programme.desc: Aboard a British train, mysterious fortune teller Dr.Schreck uses tarot cards to read the futures of five fellow passengers.

programme.title: CROSSING BRIDGE
programme.desc: When Julius loses his wife, his job and finds himself accused of a terrible crime he decides to end his life. But instead he meets an angel who takes him on a mysterious journey through the entrails of his mind which forces him to confront his problems and save his soul.

programme.title: THE SHIFTING
programme.desc: Marcela, a young Latina, is forced to flee when her family refuses to believe that her cousin raped her. Her world is ripped to pieces when she sees Joseph, her rapist, and a respected city councilman, on the news. She is grown up now and living in LA with her devoted boyfriend, Manny, who is living a clean life after years in a gang. When Manny finds out, he attempts to kill Joseph, and Marcela has to choose: get revenge or forgive the past and begin healing. This transformative film takes a realistic look at the lives we are given and the choices we make.

programme.title: ALICE DIZ
programme.desc: Daniel is a young loner who starts an online relationship with Alice, an unknown woman. Despite never having seen her, he falls in love to the point of obsession. But Alice has a secret. The Revelation of a surprising truth sends Daniel into despair, setting off a series of events that take the characters along mysterious, dangerous paths, from which there is no return

programme.title: Guard Liping Conference
programme.desc: In order to study the marching direction of the Red Army, the Central Revolutionary Military Commission ordered Sword of Xingguo to find a meeting place suitable for the Politburo to hold a safe meeting on the way. Ahead of the main force, Sword of Xingguo scouted a temporarily vacant mansion in Liping County and arranged it as the venue. The sword of Xingguo was responsible for the peripheral security mission, successfully shattered the raid plan of the enemy rangers, and ensured the smooth holding of the Politburo meeting. The resolution of the meeting changed the original plan of returning troops to western Hunan, and made a strategic decision to go north to Wu River. In early January 1935, during the Monkey Field Conference of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, the Central Revolutionary Military Commission ordered Sword of Xingguo to go to the Wu River to reconnaissance and seize the ferry. Sword of Xingguo braved the severe cold and rapids to swim across the Wu River at night to investigate the enemys fortress and defense situation, and stole an enemys ferry to return. In the process, Man Zai joined the Sword of Xingguo.

programme.title: A Serbian Film Movie Explained In Tamil | Cinemakaran
programme.desc: An ageing porn star agrees to participate in an art film in order to make a clean break from the business, only to discover that he has been drafted into making a paedophilia and necrophilia themed snuff film.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 1
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: ""I didn't expect Stalin will attend my daughter's wedding" Rahman's interview"

programme.title: Arun Kumar Rajan Home Tour
programme.desc: Welcome to Tele Vikatan, your one-stop destination for everything television! Get ready to immerse yourself in the captivating world of TV shows, exclusive interviews, soap opera reviews, and more. Our dedicated team is here to bring you the latest updates and behind-the-scenes insights from the exciting realm of television. Discover the thrill of your favorite television dramas as we delve into their gripping storylines and unforgettable characters. Join us as we go beyond the screen to explore the lives of your beloved TV stars through exclusive interviews, where they share their experiences, anecdotes, and behind-the-scenes stories. At Tele Vikatan, we are passionate about delivering high-quality content that caters to the diverse tastes and interests of our viewers. Whether youre a fan of heartwarming family dramas, thrilling mysteries, or gripping romance, we have something for everyone. We provide you with informative and entertaining videos that enhance your TV viewing experience. With Tele Vikatan, youll never miss a moment of the television magic.

programme.title: BOLT-ADE
programme.desc: Peelville is plagued by a lightning-charged beverage that is the latest weapon in the arsenal of an intergalactic megalomaniac.

programme.title: TEA TO TANGO
programme.desc: Basha arrives at the hotel ready to stack up his belly with fritters, but the said organ of his flips like a pancake when he sees the most bewitching of female primates sitting with her owner at Chai Rajas tea shop. Basha is all set to sweep her off her dainty hairy feet but minutes before that Sundar, fumbling one of his deliveries trips on Chai Rajas new jackfruit dessert and ends up doing a complicated tappangutthumove ; which as fate would have it sits absolutely in tune with the music that played on the radio. The female monkey who until now looked comatose jerks to rapturous attention. She cant take her eyes off Sundar. Basha horrified at this unexpected attention-switch tries some classy Tango to woo her. Sundar though slightly irritated by the fawning female monkey, is amused at Bashas frustration there begins an impromptu dance off between Sundar and Basha. Sadly for Basha, all the suave leaps and twists dont seem to impress the damsel of his dreams. Sundar too is in danger of facing flak from Chai Raja for delivering more tappangutthuthan tea! Sundar knowingly trips up letting Basha win the affections of the lady finally...and a pleasant surprise from Basha awaits Sundar as he drags feet to wash the dishes!

programme.title: Ghost Mansion
programme.desc: Keet and Cat’s chase ends up in a haunted house…with a crazy ghost living in it. The ghost loves Keet and wants to have her as a pet for himself.

programme.title: Where is it?
programme.desc: During a game of hide and seek Deedee and Nino come across a panicky Mewmew who cannot locate his key. Deedee creates a spell to get back all of Mewmew’s missing things and in come his key, including his long lost bubble-cordion and pocket fork. But Mewmew doesn’t want those things back as he had already replaced them. So Deedee offers to keep them as she couldn’t stand the sight of them being thrown away. On the way they find Charlie hiding from his lost but newly found alarm clock that is chasing him. The clock won’t let Charlie sleep a bit by ringing all the time, so Deedee offers to take it along with the rest. Deedee gets many more additions to her lost and found group as many more citizens of Abra-Dabra are affected with lost things. But as Deedee doesn’t have any space to store them, she puts up a give-away store. Now everyone’s happy.

programme.title: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Charlie is found napping on the job. Deedee and Nino encourage him as being the best postman ever and that anyone would doze off in the sweltering heat. Charlie assures Tiggy that he will take special care of Tiggy’s parcel and off he goes near fainting in the sweaty heat. Charlie even turns down the twins offer to help. In the heat, Charlie makes a wrong turn and reaches town-hall instead of Tiggy’s home, but still presses on to accomplish his mission. En route the special package starts to leak unawares of Charlie who is too tired and stops for a “quick” nap after nearly bumping into the Doobydoos. Deedee and Nino are searching for Charlie and find him at long last. Dejected, Charlie calls himself the worst postman in the world having melted all of Tiggy’s vanilla ice-cream. Charlie wishes Deedee to use her magic, much to the horror of Nino who hides off. Deedee’s magic refreezes not only the ice-cream, but Charlie as well! Rounding up Deedee’s friends they all take turns in delivering the letters and special parcel to keep Charlie’s goodwill intact. Mewmew is too fast that the letters fly our of the bag and the Doobydoos are too short to reach the mail boxes and the twins have a tough time reading the addresses. Finally all the tired and thoroughly perspired friends acknowledge how great Charlie is as a postman. As Charlie is now free to move, they are all surprised by Tiggy’s special delivery of ice-creams he specially made for him favourite postman. Charlie gets a well deserved nap right in front of his giggling friends.

programme.title: Remote War
programme.desc: Don and the terrific trio are at war for the TV remote. It all comes down to a swallowed remote that changes channels with every hiccup. Now that is very convenient. The mice get ready in Scuba Gear to perform a close tummy surgery to save the remote. Will sentimental soap or Jolly Good cricket win the Toss?

programme.title: SWOOPER SUNDAR
programme.desc: Chai Raja goes away on vacation and Sundar is super proud to be left in charge- Sundar slips into the sous-chef role and manages to keep the customers happy despite Bashas meddling. After a particularly hectic service, Sundar believes he has earned the right to kick back and opens his own little easy chair (modeled after Chai Rajas) to bask when he spots a beautiful poodle. Boing! Sundars heart goes a-thump and he leaps up all ready to impress the poodle. He bounds over and invites her in all Casanova style the hotel is his after all for the day- or almost. The poodle is intrigued and agrees but no sooner they take two steps that a street smart handsome hound shows up and decides that the poodle should be his arm candy. Sundar, annoyed tries to impress the poodle with his hotelier skills but the hound manages to downplay or disrupt Sundars serenading by showing off his own street smarts. Basha sees this as a perfect opportunity to lay hands on some fritters and impishly adds to Sundars woes by pranking him. Sundar must now handle both Basha and the hound as he tries to impress his lady love but the tension literally hits the roof and sends everything crashing just as Chai Raja cycles back in. The poodle gives Sundar the cold shoulder and Chai Raja a broom to clean up the mess!

programme.title: Planet Gadget
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Pool Off
programme.desc: Ever seen sharks in a swimming pool? The Rat-a-tat swimming pool has many such surprises including grenades, sharks and weights! Watch Colonel twist and turn to woo a hottie.

programme.title: A Fright Night
programme.desc: It is late night movie day and Don and Colonel are watching Dracula. Don is shell scared and the rat trio has a superb idea. Now with Charly, Marly and Larry trying all sorts of pranks, it is utter fright night for Don and Colonel. But even the rats come to fear Dracula… How???

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: Lamps And Fireworks
programme.desc: Its busy time at home with Diwali evening party , with lots of sweets , fire works and lamps.

programme.title: E. TEA
programme.desc: Sundar is on special patrol as Chai Raja has a huge order coming up and is working at night as well. It is extremely tough for Sundar to keep awake and he grabs a novel about aliens ...but it gives him the heebie-jeebies. Basha, sneaking up to snatch some fries notices Sundars nervous state of mind and decides to have some fun. Basha using his circus skills drives Sundar up the wall creating eerie sounds, shadow-dancing aliens and dangling light sabres (fireflies about a stick of bamboo). Chai Raja who believes he deserves his beauty sleep is annoyed by Sundars repeated shrieks and screams and issues an ultimatum- shut up or sleep out. Sundar takes one peek at the freezing night outside and decides to stay quiet. Basha gleefully chuckles- now it will just get better! He can rankle Sundar no end and the latter cant even utter a squeak else he will be chucked out the hotel. But Basha doesnt account for Sundars absolute aversion at the idea of being chucked out. Sundar rallies the few grey cells in his brain and decides to show the alien a thing or two. What ensues is mayhem that culminates in a blow-up ends in all three- Chai Raja, Sundar and Basha- snoozing on Bashas hammock as the hotel is extra-terrestrial style shot off into space!

programme.title: DEEP FRIED PRIDE
programme.desc: After discovering a powerful ancient mask that transforms him in to a (finally) formidable opponent, Mark turns on Durian and decides to pull rank

programme.title: Christmas
programme.desc: Its Christmas and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house with a Christmas tree, a small stable and stars, while Dunky is making a nice Christmas cake for the day.

programme.title: BABY POX
programme.desc: Everyone but Pai catches a pox that makes you act like a baby. He has to sail the Lord of the Wind by himself to get a mushroom for the cure, all while caring for the “babies.” Negu sends a huge Mutant Toad. Luckily, the toad catches the Baby Pox, too!

programme.title: PAI THE PIRATE
programme.desc: When the Guardians stumble across a treasure map, Pai happily starts playing pirate, eager to find the treasure. But the Elders warn them about the dangers of treasure, and take the map. Negu sends mutant pirates to attack the Guardians! About to walk the plank, the Guardians convince the pirates to go look for the treasure. While the pirates are distracted by the treasure, the Guardians escape to the Lord of the Wind, from which they defeat the pirates. The treasure proves to be nothing more than a bean. Pai tosses it over his shoulder, unaware that it grows into a giant stalk!

programme.title: The Easter Episode
programme.desc: Wheres the Easter Bunny? And what are chocolate bunny eggs? Gummy and Friends are about to find out

programme.title: Wheres Kala?
programme.desc: When Kala wants to practise her stealth moves, Gummy and Harry volunteer to help her. Soon Kala is scaring them from various hiding places. After a while the duo doesn’t find Kala anymore, they go too paranoid thinking that Kala is plotting an elaborate scaring plan. Gummy and Harry do all sort of crazy things until they find out that Kala actually went away for her audition in the middle of the game.

programme.title: Cryyyy-stal
programme.desc: Its valentine day and Dunky has got a small crystal cupid as a gift for his girlfriend. He has care fully kept it on the table…

programme.title: Fly Away Nino
programme.desc: Nino and Mewmew are making paper planes, but as Mewmew didn’t follow all the instructions Nino’s flies so well and much farther. And not just Nino, the twins too have fun seeing their planes fly so well. But no matter how much Mewmew tries it doesn’t fly like the planes of the others. Mewmew wishes her planes flew too so she asks Deedee to work some magic for her. So Deedee casts an ‘all day flying’ spell onto Mewmew’s plane but Nino comes in-between and gets hit by the spell on his helmet. Now Nino can’t stop flying and zooms away all over Abra-Dabra. He flies so wildly that he send Mayor De Pfeffle for a spin after knocking over his flower display. Nino is sorry for being so carried away that he tries to land, but to his surprise the helmet keeps pulling him skyward. Charlie tries weighing Nino down with his heavy mail bag, but the helmet is too strong for even Charlie to grab a hold of that Nino is flung away higher and farther. Nino promises to deliver the mail, much to the happiness of Charlie who can get a much deserved nap for all the effort. So begins Abra-Dabra’s very own first ‘air’-mail courtesy of Nino. Deedee comes up with a plan to help the ‘jet-lagged’ Nino after being inspired by the paper planes Mewmew makes. She shouts out to Nino to use a long sheet of paper from the mail bag and make a plane ‘Mewmew style’ with the wings pointing downwards. The plan works and Nino is able to fly right into Mewmew’s house and the magic wears-off as the sun sets in Abra-Dabra. In all the fuss Mewmew understands what made her planes not to fly, which actually helped Nino come down, and makes her paper planes fly so well now, thanks to Deedee.

programme.title: Castle Down
programme.desc: Sneevil and Biggs dig tunnels underneath the Castle that bring it crashing down underground. Melody and Nardy must face their fears and work together to bring the Castle back up to Smightyland.

programme.title: Nardilicious
programme.desc: Its the annual Cake Festival and the Villains have tampered with Nardys famous recipe, causing the Super Sixs heads to swell and get stuck together. Can they figure out how to use their powers together to stop Sneevil from stealing the Smighty Stones?

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: The liquorice touch
programme.desc: The twins encounter Liquorice, a girl who turns everything she touches into something sweet. After a moment of enthusiasm they discover that she is not so happy about her talent

programme.title: Paint It Back
programme.desc: Odessa gets angry when her chalk drawing is ruined by a rainstorm. In the Zooniverse, she discovers that all the color has drained away, and she and the Zoonicorns must "paint" the hues back. In the process, she discovers methods to manage her anger and frustration. How to manage anger and frustration in a positive manner.

programme.title: Where is it?
programme.desc: During a game of hide and seek Deedee and Nino come across a panicky Mewmew who cannot locate his key. Deedee creates a spell to get back all of Mewmew’s missing things and in come his key, including his long lost bubble-cordion and pocket fork. But Mewmew doesn’t want those things back as he had already replaced them. So Deedee offers to keep them as she couldn’t stand the sight of them being thrown away. On the way they find Charlie hiding from his lost but newly found alarm clock that is chasing him. The clock won’t let Charlie sleep a bit by ringing all the time, so Deedee offers to take it along with the rest. Deedee gets many more additions to her lost and found group as many more citizens of Abra-Dabra are affected with lost things. But as Deedee doesn’t have any space to store them, she puts up a give-away store. Now everyone’s happy.

programme.title: Abracadabra
programme.desc: Keet is tired of Cat chasing her all the time. She finds a book in the attic on “Great magic tricks” and soon masters them. now its time to use them.

programme.title: Three Little Pigs
programme.desc: Three little pigs decide to leave home and live separately for their own good. Little pigs each build a house to live in until a wolf makes an appearance.

programme.title: The Big Cleanup!
programme.desc: It’s a messy affair. Floors covered with mud, walls with cake splattered and filth in every nook and cranny. Don sweeps, mops, vacuums and leaves the house sparkling new but when he returns back after throwing the trash, the house is again bombarded with dirt! This goes on till Don and Colonel pack their bags and decide to leave the house. Will they ever return?

programme.title: KING SCUMWORM
programme.desc: Peng’s carelessness leads to the Ninjas fighting their way out of the nest of a huge (but dopey) parasitic monarch.

programme.title: Hokus croakus!
programme.desc: The twins make peace between a witch and a young girl whos been messing with her book of spells.

programme.title: BADminton
programme.desc: Marco & Polo are playing badminton in the backyard like a sweet family. Then the shuttle cock falls on Cats head as he is about to catch Keet.

programme.title: Roller-Skates.
programme.desc: Gummy decides to take up roller-skating – and everybody else’s world winds up being turned upside-down.

programme.title: Plastic Bottle
programme.desc: Watch Hepi an Briko transform plastic bottles to something out of this world. Literally.

programme.title: The Rolling Rice Ball
programme.desc: WI-Go drops one of his rice balls in a rat hole and gets a handful of jewelry in return. Meanwhile, a greedy neighbor next door UGo hears the news.

programme.title: The Controllator
programme.desc: Everyone has forgotten April’s birthday, so when a stranger gives her a present, she’s delighted to accept it. It’s one of Negu’s inventions, which makes her do things against her will. When April, controlled by Negu, manages to steal the Glove of the North, Pai and Xia prove that they had remembered her birthday really, and get April to remove the device that’s control her.

programme.title: HOME ALONE
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to meditate, the Guardians argue about who’s in charge. Negu takes advantage of the Elders’ absence to send cute mutants who prove to be slimy, multiplying monsters. To beat them, all the Guardians have to do is…whistle!

programme.title: Charlie’s Castle
programme.desc: It’s Uncle Charlie’s birthday and the twins have surprised him with a nap mask and breakfast, but the twins want to celebrate a little more by throwing a party and inviting all their friends. Although Charlie wishes to have a more peaceful celebration, he gives in to the pleas of Boris and Sandy. After getting a hint from Charlie on how much he loves chess, boris and sandy plan the birthday party around a ‘knights and castles’ theme. The twins get Deedee to bring balloons, a castle cake with turrets from Tiggy and a jousting dance from Mewmew. Boris and Sandy set out to decorate Uncle Charlie’s house, just in time for their friends coming in with all the goodies for the party. They even invent a balloon jousting game between Deedee and Mewmew that makes Mewmew crash into Tiggy’s cake and thereby wreck all the arrangements much to the dismay of the twins. This calls for Deedee’s magic where all the party ingredients are put into a large purple cauldron and it makes a gigantic bouncing castle in the chequerboard garden. And the snoring sounds lead them to find Uncle Charlie napping right inside it. They bounce around Uncle Charlie as much as they can and then wind down for a long snooze. Uncle Charlie awakes to happily find that the twins have organised his most best birthday slumber party ever.

programme.title: The Secrets of the Engine
programme.desc: The kids use the Mach 6 time machine to travel back in time to change their bleak future. They see the origins of the time travel car, their parents, and the rise of the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: Prima donna
programme.desc: The twins help a girl become a movie star, but she becomes a primadonna.

programme.title: Dinner Plans
programme.desc: A free entry pass into a posh hotel! What more do Don and Colonel need! But there is competition at the house. From the door of the limousine to the hotel roof top, the rats make it impossible for Don and Colonel to enjoy this rare luck of theirs. But, when in need, they all stand together. After all, what are friends for??!!

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: The Deep Freeze
programme.desc: After not following the steps to find Odessas hidden treasure, a frustrated Pancake enters the Zooniverse to find it covered in ice and snow. To "turn back on" Mt Zoonihorn, he must follow the steps and learn from his friends mistakes. Determination and following the correct steps can lead to success.

programme.title: The rudest crab that ever was
programme.desc: The twins give a grumpy Crab a lesson in good manners.

programme.title: The Bigger They Are
programme.desc: Odessa feels overwhelmed by her art project, then in the Zooniverse she helps clear the Rainbow Road of a giant bubble – and learns that big problems can become small, manageable ones. You dont have to do everything all on your own and, asking for help can be one of the best tools for problems solving.

programme.title: Bored
programme.desc: Kala is bored, and Gummy and Harry’s attempts to snap her out of it wind up having unexpected results.

programme.title: Super Gummy
programme.desc: Accidentally convinced that he’s a super hero, Gummy becomes Mind-O-Man – and sets out to help out everybody... to the point of driving them CRAZY!

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: The Red Button
programme.desc: Fred insists Brains let him watch over her lab while she visits her father’s Space Station. She agrees under one rule: “Don’t press the red button.” The entire time she’s gone, he can think of nothing else.

programme.title: Slimey Smlugs
programme.desc: Sneevils newest pet Smlugs are destroying all of the plumbing in Smightyland. The Super Six must "smlug drive" them out before its too late.

programme.title: Like A Bridge Over Troubled Teeter Totters
programme.desc: Pancake helps the Zoonicorns “imagine” a bridge across the Sticky-Icky River, but it comes out completely wrong, and he must learn not to give up and that just because something ended up a bit different than planned that it still can’t do the job. Don’t give up if something doesn’t go exactly as planned; keep trying and be creative.

programme.title: The Feast
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting him. GrandPA tells Dunky in the morning to have a very tasty and mouth watering fish curry prepared for them.

programme.title: Gummy’s Little Pet.
programme.desc: Gummy gets a small pet fish with a HUGE appetite – and he, Harry and Kala soon find that feeding this ever-ravenous, ever-growing pet is pretty much a full-time job!

programme.title: Merry Go Bush
programme.desc: Pancake isn’t taking care of his new pet fish appropriately, even though he’s trying super-hard. When he arrives in the Zoonivese and tries to help Ene take care of a Merry-Go-Bush, he learns to that there’s a right way, and a wrong way, to care for something (by following the rules), no matter the good intentions

programme.title: Don't Knock It Till You Have Built It
programme.desc: When Valeo breaks a hole from the Zooniverse INTO Pancake’s room, a swarm of Splutterbies enter as well, destroying Pancake’s house! Put yourself in someone else’s place to see how your actions might affect them and never give up in trying to accomplish your goals.

programme.title: Knot My Problem
programme.desc: Maple keeps forgetting how to tie her shoes until Promi shows her a way to remember. Practice makes perfect, and perseverance leads to achievement.

programme.title: Marco's Garden
programme.desc: The neighboring dog Moti is very fussy about his Garden of the house and takes his job seriously to guard it.

programme.title: Misadventure
programme.desc: The painter inside Don has woken and he must have his painting on the wall. But the rats are ready even to turn the world upside down to stop Don from fulfilling his dream. And you can imagine what will follow. But whatever happens in between, it is all a sweet happy ending.

programme.title: The Lost Lagoon
programme.desc: After spilling juice on mom’s blanket and not fessing up, Odessa feels guilty. In the Zooniverse, she offers to lead her friends to a lagoon to watch a butterfly dance but doesnt speak up when she loses the map. Never give up, try your hardest, and always tell the truth!

programme.title: A Smighty Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Leila and Zip go on an adventure to find the magical fairies of the forest. Sneevil has used magic to pretend to be a fairy and is looking to destroy them and steal the Earth Stone. With the help of the real forest fairies, the Super Six take back the Stone and save the day.

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: The Cup Final – Snow Queen
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of the SNOW QUEEN, by Hans Christian Andersen, having been called out by GERDA, a young girl, whose best friend, KAY, has been whisked off by a white sleigh, driven by an enigmatic woman dressed in white furs. She is the SNOW QUEEN, who has taken KAY to her palace at the North Pole. After a kiss from the SNOW QUEEN, the boy has lost all his memories and is now a prisoner in the palace of ice. SANDRA and FO will have to find him and rescue him from the powerful Lady of Winter.

programme.title: Party
programme.desc: GrandPa has gone out of town for some days and Cat has planned a cool party with the neighbouring cats. All he has to do is to get Dunky out of the house for some hours and continue his party.

programme.title: Ant Attack!
programme.desc: It is a usual day in the house with the war between the dogs and the rats. And there is a new group. In fact an army of enemies – ants! And they make the life in the house a living hell. For the first time Don , Colonel and the rat trio get a real taste of the bad ants.

programme.title: Marathon Hitch
programme.desc: IT is the running race and Don and Colonel are trying out everything possible to win. Ans when the rat trio enter the scene, the race becomes a war. But, as the wise say, slow and steady wins the race. There is an unexpected winner. And our heroes go back to their daily race.

programme.title: The Librarian
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Secret of the Fort
programme.desc: An old fort in the water is a great place for a small outing in history and Dunky is all curious to do just that. So Keet and Cat also tag along in the fort.

programme.title: Flower Power
programme.desc: Zap doubts that Leila is tough enough, but she proves you dont mess with her when Sneevil vacuums up Smightyland and the Smighties.

programme.title: Smells Like Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. programme.desc: When Pancake is having a particularly bad day, he imagines a better life – then becomes a Zoonicorn!, Appreciating the normal yet wonderful and special things in life that happen every day.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Superman Cartoon 1
programme.desc: Superman cartoons 1

programme.title: Assault and Flattery 1956
programme.desc: Bluto is accusing Popeye in judge Wimpy's courtroom. Bluto tells a sad tale of how Popeye attacked him without provocation, but Popeye tells his side, in detail (in other words, a large chunk of _Balmy Swami, A (1949)_)

programme.title: Now Hear This 1962
programme.desc: In this very abstract cartoon, a hard-of-hearing old Britisher finds a red horn and uses it as a megaphone, unaware that it is really a lost horn from the Devil's forehead. The Britisher finds that the horn has the effect of amplifying every sound psychedelically and causing him serious bodily harm

programme.title: Jungle Drums- 1943
programme.desc: Superman vs. a secret Nazi outpost disguised as a jungle temple

programme.title: Private Snafu; Volume 1-1943
programme.desc: Introducing Private Snafu, the nation's worst soldier and his various versions in different branches of the armed forces

programme.title: Gopher Spinach 1954
programme.desc: Popeye battles a gopher over his precious spinach plants.

programme.title: Suddenly It's Spring 1944
programme.desc: In this longer cartoon, Raggedy Ann's little girl mistress is seriously ill and needs sunlight to recover. Raggedy Ann sets off on a mission to the sun and other elements to make Winter end early. works a minor miracle, with the help of the elements.

programme.title: I Never Changes My Altitude 1937
programme.desc: Popeye is sitting outside Olive's lunchroom at the airport, distraught. She's closed the business to fly away with an aviator (Bluto, of course). But it's hardly what she expected; he has her painting his plane, while it's flying; when she says she's rather go back to Popeye, he tries to throw her off the plane. Popeye sees this, and takes off in a plane, just in time to help her out. The boys get into a dogfight, and Bluto manages to demolish Popeye's plane. As Popeye is falling, he grabs a duck and feeds the duck spinach. The duck manages to fly him up to Bluto's plane, Popeye has some spinach of his own, and he teaches Bluto a lesson. Popeye picks up Olive and crashes the plane into the diner, opening it (and providing a new counter).

programme.title: You Can't Shoe a Horse Fly 1940
programme.desc: Hunky and Spunky are settling in for a nap, but a horse fly sees them and sees dinner. After battling the fly for a while, the youngster enlists dad's help. But the fly is merely stunned, and rallies a new attack, this time with friends. Father eventually kills the lot of them

programme.title: Space Transformer 1985
programme.desc: Using new technology, a crew consisting of Captain Chi, Nancy, and the robots Baipam and Diatron 5, is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into Ivy's body in order to defeat the invaders. Enlisting benevolent beings found inside Ivy's body, the crew prepares for an inner space battle that can decide the fate of the world.

programme.title: The Mechanical Monsters 1941
programme.desc: Superman battles a criminal mastermind and his robot army.

programme.title: Bride and Gloom
programme.desc: Popeye is marrying Olive tomorrow; he's ecstatic. She has a dream of the future, including twin sons who prove to be a real handful. When Popeye comes by the next morning, he gets a frosty reception

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: Tillie's Punctured Romance- 1914
programme.desc: A con man from the city dupes a wealthy country girl into marriage.

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show 1962; Season 2; Episode 1; Never Name a Duck
programme.desc: Ritchie becomes very attached to two baby ducks that were left over from a show and adopts them. Rob faces the task of making Ritchie understand the consequence of trying to keep pets that may be happier living in the wild.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show: Season 3; Episode 17;High Noon in May berry
programme.desc: A hard, wounded man with gun in hand comes to Mayberry looking for Andy. Barney, aiming to keep their sheriff alive, deputizes Otis and Gomer.

programme.title: Making a Living 1914
programme.desc: An out-of-work swindler takes a job as a reporter. After witnessing a car go over cliff, he grabs a rival reporter's camera and races to the newspaper office to enter the photo as his own. His rival is delayed when he gets caught in a woman's bedroom by her jealous husband. The swindler follows the distribution of the paper containing his 'scoop' around town where he is once again chased by the rival reporter. Both end up on the cow-catcher of a streetcar

programme.title: Parlor, Bedroom and Bath-1931
programme.desc: A man tries passing off a socially awkward fellow as a Casanova in the hopes of marrying off his would be sister-in-law.

programme.title: College 1927
programme.desc: Ronald's high-school valedictory address praises books and condemns sports. His girlfriend Mary condemns his attitude. Fearing to lose her to rival Jeff, he decides to go to college and pay more attentions to sports

programme.title: You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!

programme.title: Joseph and His Brethren 1961
programme.desc: In Joseph and His Brethren, the timeless biblical story comes to life in a sweeping tale of betrayal, faith, and forgiveness. Beloved by his father but despised by his jealous brothers, Joseph is sold into slavery and carried off to Egypt. Rising from servant to trusted advisor through courage and faith, he faces temptation, injustice, and trials that test his spirit. With powerful performances and epic scope, this historical drama retells one of the Bible’s most inspiring journeys of resilience and redemption.

programme.title: Santa Claus Conquers the Martians 1964
programme.desc: In Santa Claus Conquers the Martians, holiday cheer goes interplanetary when Martians, desperate to bring joy to their children, kidnap Santa and whisk him away to the Red Planet. With the help of two Earth kids and his boundless Christmas spirit, Santa turns the tables on his captors and spreads laughter across the galaxy. Campy, colorful, and brimming with 1960s sci-fi charm, this cult favorite delivers a cosmic dose of yuletide fun.

programme.title: Don't Open Til Christmas 1984
programme.desc: In Don’t Open Till Christmas, holiday cheer turns to terror on the streets of London when a masked killer begins targeting anyone dressed as Santa Claus. As the bodies pile up, a determined detective races against time to unmask the murderer before Christmas Eve becomes a nightmare. With grisly twists, chilling suspense, and a sinister holiday atmosphere, this cult slasher proves that not every gift under the tree brings joy.

programme.title: El Extranjero
programme.desc: La historia de un humilde hombre de negocios, Quan (Jackie Chan), cuyo pasado erupciona en una venganza desenfrenada después de que su hija muera en un atentado terrorista motivado por aspectos políticos. En su búsqueda de los terroristas, Quan se ve atrapado en un juego del gato y el ratón con un político irlandés que colabora con el gobierno británico (Pierce Brosnan), cuyo pasado podría tener algo que ver con los asesinos.
